amendment.description: Amendment provides a definition for the term "voluntary" for organizations which provide family planning assistance overseas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 and printed in House Report 105-725 to specify the definition of "voluntary family planning project" and to establish criteria for the voluntary family planning projects supported by U.S. financial aid.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tiahrt amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
